NPCData.name: Merchy
NPCData.greetingTextStranger: I am a very busy man, with no time for idle chatter.
NPCData.greetingTextAcquaintance: What? Oh. I see it's you again.
NPCData.greetingTextCasualFriend: Ah! Good to see you again.
NPCData.greetingTextCloseFriend: Welcome back! I hope you have had safe travels?
NPCData.greetingTextBestFriend: My friend! It has been too long.
NPCData.giftOfferNPCText: You do realise I possess some of the rarest items across all nine oceans? This will have to be something special indeed to impress me!
NPCData.giftLikedText: Oh my. I have never seen anything like this before... simply incredible!
NPCData.giftNotLikedText: I have two dozen of these in the corner of my warehouse gathering dust. I'm not interested.

Quest.title: Bring Merchy four of the finest pieces of leather you can find.

Node.npcText: Whilst I overflow with silk, I am in dire need of some good quality leather for a customer. Can you bring me four pieces?
Oh, these are perfect! You have done me a great service, so now do me another and unburden me of these silks.
